search.prompt: Type a keyword to explore your knowledge base

search.tryAgain: Try searching again with different keywords
search.semanticHint: Results are sorted by semantic similarity and may not be an exact match to the keywords.

settings.title: Settings
settings.clearCacheConfirm: This operation will clear all knowledge base cache data, including vector database and metadata. This operation cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?

rag_table.ctx_summary_match_prefix: Exact matches found in the summaries of the following files based on your query:
rag_table.ctx_title_match_prefix: The following files were precisely located based on your query keywords:
rag_table.ctx_inference_note: Note: The above are relevant files directly found by the system. Based on these file names, it can be inferred that the content you are querying is within these files.
rag_table.desc_statistics: Based on your instruction, the system retrieved relevant documents and performed precise calculations, summarised as follows:
rag_table.desc_multi_target: The system has found multiple matching targets for you and is comparing them in parallel:
rag_table.desc_context_contrast: Analysis based on the currently locked context versus the newly mentioned targets:
rag_table.desc_multi_summary: Core content from multiple relevant documents has been summarised for you:
rag_table.summary_match_prefix: Matches found in the summaries of the following files:
rag_table.summary_precise_match: Exact matches found in the summaries of the following files based on your query:
rag_table.no_complete_record: (No record found containing complete date and amount information)
rag_table.warning_missing_data: Key data extracted failed for the following files, only file names listed
rag_table.desc_data_missing: The following files were retrieved but failed to extract valid date or amount information:
rag_table.disclaimer_auto_extract: The above content is automatically extracted by the system guard layer and is for reference only.
rag_table.tip_calculation_source: Tip: The above calculations are automatically generated based on the retrieved structured data.
rag_table.no_result_found:
No relevant information meeting the requirements was found in the database based on your query conditions.

It is recommended that you check the keywords or try a simpler description.

refresh.refreshRequired: Click the button to refresh the page to make the new model effective

status.backendError: Backend did not return processing result

update.title: Update Available
update.latest: You are using the latest version
